liber.edit.client
Class WysiwymMenuBar

java.lang.Object
  Widget
      liber.edit.client.WysiwymMenuBar

public class WysiwymMenuBar
extends Widget

A standard menu bar widget. A menu bar can contain any number of menu items, each of which can either fire a com.google.gwt.user.client.Command or open a cascaded menu bar.

CSS Style Rules

  • .gwt-WysiwymMenuBar { the menu bar itself }
  • .gwt-WysiwymMenuBar .gwt-WysiwymMenuItem { menu items }
  • .gwt-WysiwymMenuBar .gwt-WysiwymMenuItem-selected { selected menu items }

Example

Tried to adapt this so when shown, the first menu item would be selected and the user could use the cursor keys to select items. Never could get that to work though.

Adds a menu item to the bar, that will fire the given command when it is selected.

Parameters:
